about_the_game:
Discover the Altano TX, a king of the roads, now in three captivating variants! This package expands your fleet with three unique models of the Altano TX unrivaled in their functionality and attention to detail. From space-saving to seat-optimized, the Altano TX provides the ideal solution for the needs of discerning passengers on their journeys through Europe. The options offered by this expansion ensure that your fleet always has the perfect vehicle for every requirement!

In the cockpit of the Altano TX, the driver's comfort takes center stage. At first glance, it exudes a luxurious class. State-of-the-art instrumentation, perfect visibility and an intuitive control logic seamlessly merge with outstanding overall ergonomics.

Our recreation of this pioneering coach goes beyond external details with passion and attention to detail. It also focuses on the driving experience and the entire acoustic environment. Experience the Altano TX and indulge in a premium driving experience!

Variants included:


  • TX17
  • TX18
  • TX19

name: Fernbus Simulator - Altano TX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 950 or Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Specifications may change during development.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 2060 or Radeon RX 5600XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Specifications may change during development. Installation on a SDD recommended.

short_description: Experience the Altano TX with three fully functional and intricately detailed variants, each offering numerous features for a unique driving experience.
supported_languages:
English, German*, French, Polish, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Swedish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Finnish, Dutch, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
